title: Show Sign In / Sign Up as the initial screen for unauthenticated users

requirements.text: Make authentication the first screen/flow for unauthenticated users: on initial app load, automatically open the existing AuthEntryDialog (Sign In / Sign Up) before showing the main app content/sections.

quotes: First show sign in and sign up fix this

acceptanceCriteria: When a user visits the app while not authenticated, the Sign In / Sign Up dialog is shown automatically without requiring any click.
The main content (Hero/Generator/other sections) is not the primary focus until the auth dialog is dismissed or authentication completes.

requirements.text: Ensure the initial auth-first flow resolves cleanly after login: after a successful Internet Identity login from the initial AuthEntryDialog, close the dialog and continue into the app (preserving existing post-auth behavior such as scrolling to the generator when appropriate).

quotes: First show sign in and sign up fix this

acceptanceCriteria: After completing Sign In/Sign Up successfully, the auth dialog closes automatically.
The user can access the full app UI after successful authentication without needing a manual refresh.
If authentication fails, an error is shown in the dialog (using existing error UI) and the user remains in the auth flow.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only).
Do not modify immutable auth hook files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts / .tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
nonGoals: Changing backend authentication mechanisms or adding new auth providers beyond Internet Identity.
Implementing a new routing system or separate /login page unless required to achieve the auth-first behavior.
